title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-4.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-4.1 - Application

State Regulations

The provisions of this Subpart apply to buildings or
structures, whether permanent or temporary, at carnivals, fairs or amusement
parks, into which a person enters either on foot or in a conveyance, for the
purpose of being amused or startled by the devices contained
therein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
